mapper.select: SELECT /* GameMapper.getAllGames */ game_id, name, parent_id FROM game

SELECT /* GameMapper.getPermissibleGames */ g.game_id, IF(g.parent_id IS NULL, g.name, CONCAT(COALESCE(pg.name,''), ' > ', g.name)) AS name FROM game g LEFT JOIN game lg ON g.game_id = lg.parent_id LEFT JOIN game pg ON g.parent_id = pg.game_id GROUP BY g.game_id HAVING COUNT(lg.game_id) = 0 ORDER BY name
SELECT /* GameMapper.getGameById */ game_id, name, parent_id FROM game WHERE game_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* GameMapper.createGame */ game (name, parent_id) VALUES ( #{name}, #{parentId} )
